modName: Borderlands Lilith Outfit - UNP and UNPB
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=yellow]Please Read[/color][/heading]
[b]I have been having issues with the AstridBody.dds texture randomly loading in place of the characters body texture on the Lilith Shirt item when it\'s equipped. If you notice this and know how to fix it please let me know because it\'s bugging the crap out of me. Thanks [/b]

Thanks to hodilton for making this video.
[youtube]-H1hgalx78A[/youtube]

[heading]Description[/heading]
This outfit contains a recreation of the outfit Lilith wears in the game Borderland. The outfit was created using a combination of publicly available meshes and textures from around the net as well as my own meshes and textures that wear created and converted to fit the UNP and UNPB body. This Mod includes the following.

Clothes have been split up so they can be used with other armors.

Lilith Jacket   (XX0012D0)
Lilith Shirt      (XX0012C8)
Lilith Shirt Alt (XX0012CA)
Lilith Pants     (XX0012CC)
Lilith Belt       (XX0012CE)
Lilith Boots     (XX0012C6)

All Items can be found in a chest behind the Whiterun player house. To add them using the console just use \"help lilith\" to display the IDs.

[heading]Updates[/heading]
1.0 - Initial Release


[heading]Recommended[/heading]
Dimonized UNP female body - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709[/url] by dimon99


[heading]Install[/heading]
Extract the archive to your Skyrim game folder.


[heading]Uninstall[/heading]
Uncheck the TMRLilith data file in the launcher.
Delete:
- TMRLilith .esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\Cosplay\\Lilith folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\Cosplay\\Lilith folder


[heading]Creation Kit Biped Object Info[/heading]
Jacket- 57 (shoulder)
Shirt - 32 (body), 56 (chest secondary or undergarment)
Shirt Alt - 56 (chest secondary or undergarment)
Pants - 49 (Pelvis primary or outergarment)
Belt - 52 (pelvis secondary or undergarment)
Boots - 37 (Feet)



[heading]Credits[/heading]
Bethesda
Gearbox Software
dimon99 (for Dimonized UNP female body) - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709[/url]
calyps (for UNP Blessed Body UNPB) - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899[/url]
o0Crofty0o
author: ThomasR100
